alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 11:42PM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM PST SATURDAY EVENING UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snow accumulations 3 to 6 inches above 5,500 feet. Total snow 1 to 3 inches from 4,500 feet to 5,500 feet. Snow accumulations 1 inch or less from 3,000 feet to 4,500 feet. Winds will gust as high as 55 mph on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...The Kern County mountains. * WHEN...Valid from 6 PM PST Saturday evening until 10 AM PST Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Motorists should allow extra time to reach their destination due to travel delays from accumulating snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a 36 percent chance of 1 inch of snow or more along the Grapevine over Tejon Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
